arts.sum: The free-kick was cleared as far as Munetsi who unleashed a fierce strike that was saved superbly by Verbruggen onto the crossbar, but it bounced off the goalkeeper’s back to cross the line, put Wolves into the lead and send Molineux into raptures. It also came moments after no foul was given for a shirt tug on Joao Gomes and the red card was specifically for kicking a ball in frustration, which landed in the officials’ dugout that sits in between the home and away dugouts.

arts.ttl: Fabian Hurzeler feels Brighton deserved more than a late equaliser at Wolves
arts.sum: The teams shared two points at Molineux.

arts.ttl: Wolves 1-1 Brighton (5 de Oct., 2025) Resultado Final

arts.ttl: Jan Paul van Hecke’s late header for Brighton denies Wolves a first win
arts.sum: Wolves manager Vitor Pereira was given a red card in the first half.

arts.ttl: Van Hecke saves point for Brighton after Verburggen’s own goal against Wolves
arts.sum: Brighton came away with a point with a 1-1 draw against Wolves after Jan Paul van Hecke managed to cancel out teammate Bart Verbruggen’s 21st-minute own goal

arts.ttl: Wolves vs Brighton LIVE: Strand Larsen fit for Wolves as Welbeck starts for Brighton
arts.sum:
Wolves XI: Johnstone, Tchatchoua, S.Bueno, Krejci, H.Bueno, Andre, J.Gomes, Munetsi, Arias, Hwang, Larsen.

Brighton XI: Verbruggen, Wieffer, Van Hecke, Dunk, Kadioglu, Baleba, Ayari, Gruda, Gomez, Minteh, Welbeck.

arts.ttl: Wolves, Brighton starting lineups confirmed! Is Strand Larsen passed fit for Pereira's side?
